title: "Steve Heimler's YouTube videos aid AP History and Government students, but emphasize the importance of active learning."
description: Steve Heimler offers YouTube videos to help students succeed in AP History and AP Government classes, but emphasizes that true learning requires more than just watching videos.

title: "Heimler's history note guides for active engagement and improved understanding."
description: Heimler has created note guides for his history videos that follow along with what he's saying. They include a learning objective, fill-in-the-blank sections, and a summary box. They are designed to help students actively engage with the material and improve their understanding. The note guides are best for getting an A in class, while the review pack is better for reviewing and practicing everything needed to know. Unit 1 and 2 are free for all classes.

title: "Note Guides for Exam Review and Practice Recommended by Heimler"
description: Get note guides to review and practice for class exams and national exam in May. Highly recommended by Heimler.
